page.title: 04Kettering Town Football Club
page.content: On Rockingham Road there is a football ground,it is the home of Kettering Town (The Poppies)and The local American Football Team,The Northampton Stormbringers.Next to the ground there is a club called The Bowling Green. There are Squash courts,pool tables, snooker tables,billiard tables,table tennis tables,darts boards and a bar. In 1985 Kettering Town were in finicial trouble and were in danger of having to sell their ground but an anonymous loacalk farmer has rescued the club from extinction.The wages bill for the club is 1000 pounds per week.
